title: Rightwards Pushing Hand
description:
A profile of an open hand pushing or positioned with the palm toward the right. 

May be used to show a hand pushing something away or to represent rejection of something in general. May also be used with with ðŸ«· Leftwards Pushing Hand to show hands high fiving or holding, pressing, or squishing something.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rightwards pushing hand emoji is designed with a clean, modern aesthetic, featuring smooth, rounded fingers and a palm presented with realistic lighting that gives it a tactile, three-dimensional quality. The skin tone is rendered with subtle gradients and a gentle gloss, conveying a sense of polite but firm action. On Apple devices, this emoji effectively symbolizes pushing forward, making progress, moving something aside, or offering a gentle but decisive 'stop' or 'go' signal.
